name: @shopsync/cli

scripts.build: tsc && node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' helpers/build.ts

author: Daniel Nordby
description: A lightweight CLI to help sync your Shopify customizations with the latest theme updates from Shopify, or other premium themes.
